name: polymer-starter-kit-custom-build
description: A starting point for Polymer 1.0 custom build apps

scripts.package-template: aws cloudformation package --template-file cloudformation/stack-template.json --output-template-file cloudformation/stack-template-packaged.yaml --s3-bucket gitcheese-artifacts --profile gitcheese
scripts.deploy-dev: aws cloudformation deploy --template-file cloudformation/stack-template-packaged.yaml --profile gitcheese --stack-name githceese-ui-dev --region us-east-1 --capabilities CAPABILITY_IAM --parameter-overrides ProjectName=gitcheese ServiceName=ui BranchName=dev
scripts.deploy-master: aws cloudformation deploy --template-file cloudformation/stack-template-packaged.yaml --profile gitcheese --stack-name githceese-ui-master --region us-east-1 --capabilities CAPABILITY_IAM --parameter-overrides ProjectName=gitcheese ServiceName=ui BranchName=master
